    org.jnetpcap
    Core libpcap functionality available on all platforms.

      <T> int Pcap.dispatch(int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T user)
      Collect a group of packets. pcap_dispatch() is used to collect and process packets. cnt specifies the maximum number of packets to process before returning.
      private <T> int Pcap.dispatch(int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T user, PcapHeader header, JBuffer buffer)
      Dispatch.
      static <T> PcapTask<T> PcapUtils.dispatchInBackground(Pcap pcap, int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T data)
      Runs the dispatch function in a background thread.
      <T> int Pcap.loop(int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T user)
      Collect a group of packets. pcap_loop() is similar to pcap_dispatch() except it keeps reading packets until cnt packets are processed or an error occurs.
      private <T> int Pcap.loop(int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T user, PcapHeader header, JBuffer buffer)
      Loop.
      static <T> PcapTask<T> PcapUtils.loopInBackground(Pcap pcap, int cnt, JBufferHandler<T> handler, T data)
      Runs the loop function in a background thread.
